amass.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if you amass money, knowledge, information etc, you gradually collect a large amount of it
amass.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: For 25 years, Darwin amassed evidence to support his theories.
He amassed a fortune after the war.
amass.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to collect a large amount of something gradually over a period of time, especially money or information
amass.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: She has amassed a £94 million fortune through her family’s hotel and banking chain.
